Steps to reproduce:

Building Spidermonkey 1.85 for Mingw 4.6.  Attempting to build js.exe through make.exe command.  


Actual results:

After tinkering with the configure file I am able to configure for Mingw.  Then after a couple of additions to header files I am able to successfully build most of the spidermonkey objects files.  At the end it attempts to build js.exe (from makefile in src/config) but fails due to the fact that is removes "\" and "/" from the directory path.  An example of an error in my case is:

g++.exe: c:mingwdevelopspidermonkey185jssrcjsapi.o: No such file or directory

Obviously it's not finding the file because the path is invalid.  


Expected results:

The path should have contained "/" forward slashes and it should have successfully located the required object files.  I have already successfully built Spidermonkey 1.85 with Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0 without any problems so this may be due to something related to the fact that I am using Mingw now.
